"Stamps":
"The \"Stamp\" system allows you to insert illustrations into your chat.

Some Stamps are animated, and some play sound effects, allowing you to communicate in a variety of fun ways."

"You can send a Stamp with the Stamp button in the Log Window, or by opening the Main Menu with , selecting \"Chat\", then \"Stamps\".

You can check which Stamps you've used from the \"History\" tab."
